description: Niobium is a shiny, ductile metal valued for its ability to strengthen steel alloys while maintaining flexibility. It is widely used in pipelines, aerospace components, and superconducting magnets. Niobium alloys resist heat and corrosion, making them ideal for high-performance engineering. In electronics, niobium plays a role in capacitors and advanced superconducting materials. Although not abundant, its stability and versatility keep it important in modern technology.
name: Niobium
